DOC.brief_title: National Lung Cancer Registry Men Women Based Diagnosis Algeria
DOC.detailed_description: The study consist : - All patient meet inclusion/exclusion criterion present oncologists/pulmonologists routine visit recruitment period sequentially ask participate study . - The patient consent report new case lung cancer incidence study . The patient consent participate study perform four in-hospital visit ( Inclusion visit , visit 3 , 6 12 month ) . In addition 4 visit , phone contact patient every 6 month year 2,3 , 4 5 do investigator one his/her authorise representative CRO routine visit investigator , check patient 's survival status . THE STUDY DURATION 72 MONTHS
